pages.title: Netherite
pages.text: $(item)Netherite$() is a rare material from the $(thing)Nether$(), used primarily to upgrade $(item)Diamond$() gear. $(br2)$(item)Netherite$() items are more powerful and durable than $(item)Diamond$(), can float in lava, and cannot burn. $(br)$(li)For $(item)Netherite$(), you must first find $(item)Ancient Debris$() in the $(thing)Nether$()!
$(item)Netherite$() gear is made by upgrading $(item)Diamond$() gear using a $(item)Smithing Table$().
